channel.title: Can we have an evil with the ability to steal or delete someone's royal blood?
channel.description: We need a plausible explanation for royal claims not stepping up. Kind of lame that not stepping up is a no-brainer exe.

item.title: Can we have an evil with the ability to steal or delete someone's royal blood?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Irrelevant. We are not saying they are Unseen. Just that they hurt BD more than if they didn’t exist.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we have an evil with the ability to steal or delete someone's royal blood?

item.title: Can we have an evil with the ability to steal or delete someone's royal blood?
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Not always. It’s technically not gamethrowing as they don’t have to survive to the unseen win, just defeat the BD(and not even that with scorned/fool).

Read full topic
item.source: Can we have an evil with the ability to steal or delete someone's royal blood?

item.title: Can we have an evil with the ability to steal or delete someone's royal blood?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Hell even from a more meta perspective herbalist should be social. Princess See’s social/support, when you are looking for a convert social = falsifying results while offensive = direct disruption. There would be 3 Unseen Social and 3 Unseen Offensive ECT ECT ECT.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we have an evil with the ability to steal or delete someone's royal blood?

item.title: Can we have an evil with the ability to steal or delete someone's royal blood?
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Welp this is social and this is offensive according to the wiki

Social classes can use the chat system and social abilities to forge allies or disrupt communication between players.

Offensive classes can disrupt their foes directly with their abilities.

So I guess you could say herb is a social class

Read full topic
